pageContent:
Manitheja.Y 
DevOps Engineer 
 
 
Email:manithejay@gmail.com 
Mobile:+91-9381076443
 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY: 
Having 5+ years of experience in the IT industry and hands on experience with Linux, 
AWS , DevOps, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Shell Script, Apache, Tomcat Application 
Server. 
 
SKILL SUMMARY ( AWS & DEVOPS) : 
 Hands on Experience in Cloud Technologies like Amazon Web Services (AWS) VPC , 
EC2, S3, IAM, ELB, ALB, EBS, CloudTrail, CloudFront. 
 Managing users and roles and privilege services using IAM in AWS. 
 Hands experience on Amazon EC2 cloud deployments using DevOps tools like Docker, 
Jenkins , Kubernetes and Terraform. 
 Hands experience on Amazon EC2 cloud deployments using DevOps tools like Docker, 
Jenkins , Kubernetes and Ansible. 
 Creating S3 buckets in Account for the dev team and configuring Life Cycle 
Managements and Bucket Versioning concepts. 
 Launching Amazon EC2 Cloud Instances using Amazon Web Services(Linux/ Ubuntu)

Managements and Bucket Versioning concepts. 
 Launching Amazon EC2 Cloud Instances using Amazon Web Services(Linux/ Ubuntu) 
and Configuring launched instances with respect to specific applications. 
 Hands on experience in Kubernetes, Jenkins, Git, Terraform, Docker, Maven. 
 Integrating Jenkins with Cyberark Conjur Cloud and Edge Node. 
 Hands on Experience on setting up the Conjur Master and Followers, Managing the 
Application Secrets in CyberArk Vault. 
 Hands on experience on Setting up the CyberArk PAM, Identity Management, 
Creating Safes and Accounts in Conjur Cloud and Edge, Vault Synchronizer for 
Secrets Rotation, CPM, Safes and Accounts. 
 Experience in on-Boarding of various Platform accounts in Cyber-Ark. 
 Experience in integrating various platforms with Cyber-Ark , such as Windows Servers, 
Unix Servers. 
 Good Understand and knowledge in using CyberArk Conjur vault to retrieve secrets

 Experience in integrating various platforms with Cyber-Ark , such as Windows Servers, 
Unix Servers. 
 Good Understand and knowledge in using CyberArk Conjur vault to retrieve secrets 
from vault in injecting secrets into CICD pipelines for Java Applications, MuleSoft 
Applications from the Jenkins Credentials Store. 
 Hands on experience in automating application deployment using Jenkins. 
 Strong emphasis and in-depth knowledge on Jenkins Pipeline projects, installing 
plugins, build and deploy applications to servers. 
 Building/Maintaining Docker container clusters managed by Kubernetes , Linux, 
GIT, Docker. Utilized Kubernetes and Docker for the runtime environment of the CI/CD 
system to build, test deploy. 
 Expertise in version source Management tools like GIT. 
 Good experience using Maven for building java based web applications. 
 Hands on Experience on Continuous Integration tool like Jenkins.

 Expertise in version source Management tools like GIT. 
 Good experience using Maven for building java based web applications. 
 Hands on Experience on Continuous Integration tool like Jenkins. 
 Hands on experience with Configuration Management Tool such as Ansible. 
 Experience in deploying the code through web/application server like Apache ,Tomcat. 
 Deploying EAR/WAR files in Application Servers like Tomcat Application Server. 
 Having knowledge on setting up and managing Docker private repository and 
maintaining the Containers using Docker.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE: 
 Working as a DevOps Engineer from Dec-2021 to Nov-2023 at IDC 
Technologies,                                      Bangalore.  
 Worked as a Associate Software Engineer at Nat IT Services Pvt Ltd, 
Hyderabad from  May-2021 to April-2021.  
 Worked as a DevOps Engineer at Artifint Technologies,  Hyderabad  from  
Oct-2019  to May-2021. 
 
EDUCATION: 
 
B.Tech(E.C.E) from JNTU, Anantapur in 2016 
 
TECHNICALSKILLS: 
 
Core Skills DevOps Tools, Linux/Unix 
Cloud Platform AWS 
AWS Infrastructure Provision Terraform 
Configuration Management Ansible 
Build Tools Maven 
Version Control Tools Github, Git 
Web Servers Apache, Tomcat 
CI CD Tool Jenkins , Cloudbees CI 
Languages/Scripts Shell Scripting. 
Containerization Tools Docker, Kubernetes 
Container Orchestration EKS, Kubernetes 
Monitoring Tools Cloud Watch, ELK 
Artifact Repository S3, Nexus, AWS ECR 
Code quality(continuous inspection) Sonarqube 
Tracking Tools Jira 
Operating Systems Linux, Mac OS

Monitoring Tools Cloud Watch, ELK 
Artifact Repository S3, Nexus, AWS ECR 
Code quality(continuous inspection) Sonarqube 
Tracking Tools Jira 
Operating Systems Linux, Mac OS 
 
Project Details 
Title: DevOps Engineer 
Organisation: IDC Technologies, Bangalore 
Domain: Cyber Security 
Client: TCS(CyberArk) 
Environment: Git, Jenkins, EC2, VPC, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Java, MuleSoft, 
CyberArk Vault. 
Operating Systems: Amazon Linux, Terraform

Responsibilities: 
 
 Creating the End-to-End automations scripts for deploying the application into the 
Kubernetes EKS Cluster. 
 Involved in Integrating Jenkins with Cyberark Conjur Cloud and Edge Node. 
 Creating the Jenkins CI/CD Pipelines for Build, Test and Deployment process. 
 Involved in creating CI/CD pipeline for spring boot plugin. 
 Created docker files to install java, Maven, Conjur and java application. 
 Generating the Conjur certificates and adding into the Trusted store. 
 Setting up the Jenkins environment locally and configuring the Conjur Vault to fetch 
the conjur provided secrets into the Jenkins credentials store. 
 Involved in integrating Jenkins with CyberArk conjur product. 
 Setup the local development environments through Docker containers for new 
developers. 
 Developing build and deployment pipelines using Jenkins , Maven for Java 
applications 
 Explored on SSL. For Java application to connect securely to vault.

developers. 
 Developing build and deployment pipelines using Jenkins , Maven for Java 
applications 
 Explored on SSL. For Java application to connect securely to vault. 
 Created custom annotation so Users can Just use our annotation to fetch secrets 
instead of changing code. 
 Involved in fetching secrets from Conjur to connect with Docker, Kubernetes, nexus 
from Jenkins. 
 
 
Project Details 
Title: Associate Software Engineer 
Organization: NatSoft 
Environment : Linux, DevOps, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ansible, AWS, Maven, 
Apache, Tomcat, Red Hat Linux, CICD Pipelines 
Responsibilities: 
 
 Well-versed  with  Amazon  Web  Services(AWS)  provisioning  and  good  knowledge  of 
AWS services like EC2 , Elastic Load-balancers , ALB , S3 , Cloud Front , EBS , RDS , VPC , 
Route53, Cloud watch ,Cloud Trail , Cloud Formation ,IAM. 
 Launching Amazon EC2 Cloud Instances using Amazon Web Services(Linux/ Ubuntu)

Route53, Cloud watch ,Cloud Trail , Cloud Formation ,IAM. 
 Launching Amazon EC2 Cloud Instances using Amazon Web Services(Linux/ Ubuntu) 
and Configuring launched instances with respect to specific applications. 
 Defined AWS Security Groups which acted as virtual firewalls that controlled the traffic 
allowed reaching one or more AWS EC2 instances. 
 Configuring and Networking of Virtual Private Cloud(VPC). 
 Involved in enhancing Jenkins plugin for cyberark. 
 Created VPC environment using terraform. 
 Involved in integrating Terraform with Cyberark conjur plugin.

 Develop Cloud Formation scripts to automate EC2 instances. 
 Implemented AWS EC2 , IAM , S3 , EBS , Elastic Load balancer(ELB) ,Auto Scaling. 
 Created alarms and notifications for EC2 instances using Cloud Watch. 
 Installed and configured Nagios monitor tool performance on all nodes. 
 Used Jenkins , Build for for Continuous Integration and ContinuousDelivery(CICD) into 
Tomcat Application Server 
 Created Docker files and build images and push to the Docker private registry. 
 Setup the local development environments through Docker containers for new 
developers. 
 Developing build and deployment pipelines using Jenkins , Maven for Java applications 
 Strong working knowledge on GIT. 
 Developed a fully automated continuous integration system using Git ,Jenkins and 
custom tools developed in Bash. 
 Experience in build management and continuous integration tools .(Jenkins) 
 Designed and built cloud service models including Infrastructure-as-a-Service(Iaas)

custom tools developed in Bash. 
 Experience in build management and continuous integration tools .(Jenkins) 
 Designed and built cloud service models including Infrastructure-as-a-Service(Iaas) 
Driving industry best practice implementation around CI/CD and infrastructure 
management. 
 Installing ,configuring and administering Jenkins CI tool on Linux machines. 
 Setup and maintained Development ,QA ,Pre-Production ,and Production 
environments.
